items.sentence: I don\'t want Tom telling Mary she needs to be here all day.
I don\'t want to have to listen to Tom sing that song again.
There are people who seldom speak unless they\'re spoken to.
Some people have trouble getting their dogs to eat dog food.
They sell computers at very reasonable prices at that store.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t feel like going to work today.
Tom told Mary that he wasn\'t going to go to Boston with us.
I\'ve already told Tom that he won\'t be allowed to do that.
I didn\'t fall asleep until after 2 o\'clock in the morning.
If you eat nothing but ice cream, you\'ll get a stomachache.
If you ever come to Boston, you\'re welcome to stay with us.
If you stack the dishes up by the sink, I\'ll do them later.
If you want to go there, I\'m not going to try and stop you.
No matter how hard I try, I can\'t remember the exact words.
Tom lost the sight in one of his eyes in a traffic accident.
Tom probably bought that with the money his father gave him.
Let\'s see who can hold their breath underwater the longest.
I wasn\'t sure I could trust Tom, so I didn\'t say anything.
All you have to do is study hard to get into a good college.
Are you honestly telling me you never want to see Tom again?
By the time I got to school, the class had already finished.
Have you finished reading the book I lent you the other day?
I thought you said you were going to be in Boston this week.
It was only yesterday that I realized what she really meant.
Are you interested in participating in this discussion, Tom?
Because of the heavy fog, not a single person could be seen.
We have more important things that need to be taken care of.
We now have all the evidence we need to convict Tom Jackson.
Tom doesn\'t need to be told more than once to do something.
Tom doesn\'t only teach the guitar, he often gives concerts.
Tom doesn\'t remember too much about what happened that day.
Tom doesn\'t like it when people park in front of his house.
Don\'t let Tom eat dessert until he\'s eaten his vegetables.
Tom can\'t figure out how to fill out this application form.
Tom couldn\'t control himself when he saw Mary kissing John.
Tom is the only one who thinks it\'s a good idea to do that.
You should concentrate on one thing and learn to do it well.
You should go to the dentist and have that tooth pulled out.
Tom can\'t carry all those suitcases so you should help him.
Tom can\'t get out of his sleeping bag. The zipper is stuck.
Tom certainly talks as if he knows what he\'s talking about.
A man is as old as he feels and a woman as old as she looks.
Tom should have told Mary right away that he wasn\'t single.
Why don\'t you try putting a little cinnamon in your coffee?
You\'re the only person I know that has ever visited Boston.
Tom wanted to study Japanese with a native Japanese speaker.
Tom was almost crushed by the tree that he was cutting down.
Tom was angry at Mary for leaving their children unattended.
Tom was glad that Mary understood what he was trying to say.
Tom didn\'t even have the courtesy to say that he was sorry.
